newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Bangladesh taka ends steady in dull trading.
newsitem.headline: Bangladesh taka ends steady in dull trading.

text.p: The Bangladesh taka closed steady at 42.5490/42.5495 to the dollar in interbank trading on Sunday compared with the previous close at 42.5490/5500.
Dealers said trading was dull with little selling offers. "The demand was also lower than expected earlier because of tight liquidity in the money market," said one dealer with a foreign bank.
The interbank call money rates closed at 6.5-7.0 percent against the previous 7.0-7.5 percent, dealers said.
